mapper.select: SELECT ci.user_id AS userId, ci.nick_name AS nickName, ci.avatar AS avatar, c.comment_content AS commentContent, ci.create_at AS createAt, ci.update_at AS updateAt, ci.parent_comment_id AS parentCommentId, c.id AS commentId FROM ams_comment_info AS ci INNER JOIN ams_art_comment AS c ON c.comment_info_id = ci.id WHERE ci.article_id = #{articleId} AND (ci.deleted IS NULL OR ci.deleted = 0);
